name: Fighter (Prentice-Hall)
overview: Published in the book, "100 Programs for the Commodore 64". In this game you are the pilot of a First World War aircraft. you have to shot down the Red Baron and two of his henchmen. If you don't succeed withing a certain time they will get you. Your guns are set for the nearer aircraft. The cunning Baron knows this and stays at long range. You can hit him, but not if he is in the dead center of your sights. Like a WWI fighter, this game requires a joystick.
